thread.title: New edition of Erie Canalway Trail guidebook available
thread.title_full: New edition of Erie Canalway Trail guidebook available

title: New edition of Erie Canalway Trail guidebook available
text: New edition of Erie Canalway Trail guidebook available Comment Posted Aug. 14, 2015 at 9:25 AM Updated at 9:25 AM Posted Aug. 14, 2015 at 9:25 AM Wayne, N.Y. The fourth edition of “Cycling the Erie Canal: A guide to 400 miles of adventure and history along the Erie Canalway Trail” features new sections of the trail and up-to-date listings of services. The new edition includes maps that detail the trail route, parks, museums, historic sites, visitor centers, lodging, bike shops, services and parking areas. The trail route runs east-west between Buffalo and Albany in upstate New York. For more information, call 518-434-1583 or visit ptny.org . Wayne Post
